Create a personalized coffee mug with your name or initials on it. This will make you feel special and like you're a part of the team.
Decorate your coffee mug with a motivational quote or phrase to help you stay focused and motivated.
Add a small note or reminder to your coffee mug to remind you of your goals and aspirations.
Use your coffee mug as a reminder of your accomplishments and successes. Write down a few of your biggest achievements and keep them on your mug to remind you of how far you've come.
Use your coffee mug as a reminder of your values and principles. Write down a few of your most important beliefs and keep them on your mug to remind you to stay true to yourself.
